publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3073.1 Stewart Stevenson: Transport Strategy for Aberdeen and North East Scotland-As an amendment to motion (S1M-3073) in the name of Elaine Thomson, insert at end "while noting that the absence of a bypass for Aberdeen continues to present businesses north of the city with a severe constraint upon their future development."

S1M-3073.1 Stewart Stevenson: Transport Strategy for Aberdeen and North East Scotland-As an amendment to motion (S1M-3073) in the name of Elaine Thomson, insert at end "while noting that the absence of a bypass for Aberdeen continues to present businesses north of the city with a severe constraint upon their future development."
S1M-3073.1 Transport Strategy for Aberdeen and North East Scotland (lodged on 8 May 2002) Shona Robison*
S1M-3073.1 Transport Strategy for Aberdeen and North East Scotland (lodged on 8 May 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*
